HomeBenefits.title: Top Benefits of the Best AI Question Generator

benefits.title: Quick Creation in One Click!
benefits.description: Students, scholars, and business owners usually struggle to balance personal, academic, and work commitments. At Hearify, we offer a fast AI quiz generator that can create a detailed quiz within minutes. Save time usually needed to prepare a quiz manually.

benefits.title: Adaptive content
benefits.description: We offer the best AI for multiple choice questions that can produce quizzes up to your proficiency level and educational experience. The platform will adjust both the type and difficulty level of questions instantly. Adaptive learning enables us to address your unique goals and needs.

benefits.title: Multilingual Support
benefits.description: Online AI quiz maker can create quizzes in different languages, making study sessions less hectic and educational content more accessible to users from all over the globe. Educators can cater to different learners, making educational programs more diverse, effective, and accessible.

benefits.title: Advanced Analytics

Thus, you can clearly see both your strengths and gaps in your knowledge. Teachers and professors can use it to improve curriculum, understand the effectiveness of teaching methods.

HomeReviews.title: Hearify Reviews: Hear Our Happy Customers!
HomeReviews.description: Find out why our customers love Hearify. Read their testimonials and learn how our AI quiz builder transforms the content creation process by making it faster, smarter, and more efficient. From educators to businesses, you can turn PDF, video, and text into interactive quizzes in just a few clicks.

reviews.name: Yuliia Gorbatenko
reviews.text: I tried Hearify several times, and I must say it's much better than ChatGPT, especially taking into account the number of mistakes and redundancy in questions, when I asked ChatGPT to create some quizzes for me. Hearify creates really interesting questions, that make sense - I admired it. I tried it with the difficult topics my student asked me to help with and I am happy with the results ❤️

reviews.name: Artem Oharkov
reviews.text: Hearify provides a good starting point, while you stay in control and can edit, discard, or add extra questions. It helps me with writer's block and provides a fresh perspective of what might be asked.

reviews.name: Valeriia Chorna
reviews.text: Hearify saved us during the most stressful moment when we urgently needed a real-time quiz for our event. The platform is really user-friendly, everything was quick and easy to set up, and it perfectly met our needs 🙏

reviews.name: Maria Revenko
reviews.text: The tool is very user-friendly and understandable. It was easy for me to create a quiz and to modify it. We've used quizes after training as a proof of successful material learning. We like the function that it's possible to see the detailed results and to export them.

HomeWhyUs.title: Why Choose Our AI Quiz Generator
HomeWhyUs.description: Using our question answer generator makes the process of creating, managing, and analyzing quizzes a breeze. Here’s why you should make your next quiz with us:

blocks.title: It’s time-saving
blocks.description: Our platform quickly produces quizzes by effectively leveraging databases of questions and answers, saving precious time of students, trainers, educators, business owners, etc.

blocks.title: It deals with diverse question types
blocks.description: Our question generator creates various types of questions (fill-in, multiple choice, etc.) that work well with your particular learning style.

blocks.title: Engagement enhancement
blocks.description: Adaptive and interactive quizzes tend to make learning more enjoyable and engaging. You’re welcome to share the quiz with your college fellows (suitable for large classes and online courses).

blocks.title: Content flexibility
blocks.description: Hearify generates quizzes using content from various sources. We offer an easy-to-use question generator from PDF, text, video files. This allows students to test their skills from the comfort of their home.

blocks.question: Is Hearify free?
blocks.answer: At Hearify, we offer a free version that allows you to create 5 quizzes with 5 single-choice questions. For more advanced features and higher quiz limits, paid plans are available starting from $7.99 per month.

blocks.question: Who can use AI quiz generator?
blocks.answer: AI quiz maker can be used by a wide range of individuals and organizations in many niches, including self-learners, college and high school students, HR professionals, corporate trainers, college professors and high school teachers, private instructors, parents, guardians, etc. This makes our quiz maker for teachers, educators, students, content creators a universal tool.

blocks.question: What types of questions can I create?
blocks.answer: You are welcome to generate various types of questions, such as multiple-choice questions (multiple choice test maker requires you to give 1 or more correct answers), single choice questions (1 correct answer), matching questions (connect items from one column with issue in the other), open questions (you’re required to provide a response), and fill in questions (fill in the blanks in the sentence with the correct words).

blocks.question: How can I export my quiz questions?
blocks.answer: When you create online quiz, go to the Quizzes section and click your quiz. Once it is there, click the Export button. You will see 4 options available: Copy Link, Copy Code (copy the quiz’s code, paste it into the search bar, and join the quiz!), Share Access (let other users edit, share, and remove your quiz), and Google Forms (export the quiz to Google Forms).

blocks.question: What is the quality of the quizzes?
blocks.answer: The quality of quizzes created by our AI question answer generator is quite high due to several factors. First of all, our generator uses vast and regularly updated databases. Second, it adjusts the difficulty of questions based on your (unique!) performance and goals. Third, it creates multiple types of questions. Finally, it guarantees a solid consistency in both – the structure and format of questions. This is especially useful and effective when you have to deal with large-scale assessments.

SERVICE means the https://hearify.org website operated by Hearify, Inc.

PERSONAL DATA means data about a living individual who can be identified from those data (or from those and other information either in our possession or likely to come into our possession).

USAGE DATA is data collected automatically either generated by the use of Service or from Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).

COOKIES are small files stored on your device (computer or mobile device).

DATA CONTROLLER means a natural or legal person who (either alone or jointly or in common with other persons) determines the purposes for which and the manner in which any personal data are, or are to be, processed. For the purpose of this Privacy Policy, we are a Data Controller of your data.

DATA PROCESSORS (OR SERVICE PROVIDERS) means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Data Controller. We may use the services of various Service Providers in order to process your data more effectively.

DATA SUBJECT is any living individual who is the subject of Personal Data.

THE USER is the individual using our Service. The User corresponds to the Data Subject, who is the subject of Personal Data.
PrivacyPolicy.information-collection:
Information Collection and Use

We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you.
PrivacyPolicy.types-data:
Types of Data Collected

Personal Data

While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you («Personal Data»). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

  • Email address
  • First name and last name
  • Address, State, Province, ZIP/Postal code, City
  • Cookies and Usage Data

We may use your Personal Data to contact you with newsletters, marketing or promotional materials and other information that may be of interest to you. You may opt out of receiving any, or all, of these communications from us by following the unsubscribe link.

Usage Data

We may also collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Service or when you access Service by or through a mobile device («Usage Data»). This Usage Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.

When you access Service with a mobile device, this Usage Data may include information such as the type of mobile device you use, your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of your mobile device, your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser you use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.

Tracking Cookies Data

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and we hold certain information.

Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device. Other tracking technologies are also used such as beacons, tags and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze our Service.

You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service.

Examples of Cookies we use:

  • Session Cookies: We use Session Cookies to operate our Service.
  • Preference Cookies: We use Preference Cookies to remember your preferences and various settings.
  • Security Cookies: We use Security Cookies for security purposes.
  • Advertising Cookies: Advertising Cookies are used to serve you with advertisements that may be relevant to you and your interests.

PrivacyPolicy.gdpr-rights:
Your Data Protection Rights Under General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)

If you are a resident of the European Union (EU) and European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain data protection rights, covered by GDPR.

We aim to take reasonable steps to allow you to correct, amend, delete, or limit the use of your Personal Data.

If you wish to be informed what Personal Data we hold about you and if you want it to be removed from our systems, please email us at hearify.tech@gmail.com.

In certain circumstances, you have the following data protection rights:

  • The right to access, update or to delete the information we have on you.
  • The right of rectification. You have the right to have your information rectified if that information is inaccurate or incomplete.
  • The right to object. You have the right to object to our processing of your Personal Data.
  • The right of restriction. You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal information.
  • The right to data portability. You have the right to be provided with a copy of your Personal Data in a structured, machine-readable and commonly used format.
  • The right to withdraw consent. You also have the right to withdraw your consent at any time where we rely on your consent to process your personal information.

Please note that we may ask you to verify your identity before responding to such requests.

Please note, we may not be able to provide Service without some necessary data.

You have the right to complain to a Data Protection Authority about our collection and use of your Personal Data. For more information, please contact your local data protection authority in the European Economic Area (EEA).
PrivacyPolicy.caloppa-rights:
Your Data Protection Rights under the California Privacy Protection Act (CalOPPA)

CalOPPA is the first state law in the nation to require commercial websites and online services to post a privacy policy. The law’s reach stretches well beyond California to require a person or company in the United States (and conceivable the world) that operates websites collecting personally identifiable information from California consumers to post a conspicuous privacy policy on its website stating exactly the information being collected and those individuals with whom it is being shared, and to comply with this policy.

According to CalOPPA we agree to the following:

  • Users can visit our site anonymously;
  • Our Privacy Policy link includes the word «Privacy», and can easily be found on the page specified above on the home page of our website;
  • Users will be notified of any privacy policy changes on our Privacy Policy Page;
  • Users are able to change their personal information by emailing us at hearify.tech@gmail.com.
PrivacyPolicy.do-not-track:
Our Policy on «Do Not Track» Signals

We honor Do Not Track signals and do not track, plant cookies, or use advertising when a Do Not Track browser mechanism is in place. Do Not Track is a preference you can set in your web browser to inform websites that you do not want to be tracked. You can enable or disable Do Not Track by visiting the Preferences or Settings page of your web browser.
PrivacyPolicy.ccpa-rights:
Your Data Protection Rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)

If you are a California resident, you are entitled to learn what data we collect about you, ask to delete your data and not to sell (share) it. To exercise your data protection rights, you can make certain requests and ask us:

(a) What personal information we have about you.

If you make this request, we will return to you:

  • The categories of personal information we have collected about you.
  • The categories of sources from which we collect your personal information.
  • The business or commercial purpose for collecting or selling your personal information.
  • The categories of third parties with whom we share personal information.
  • The specific pieces of personal information we have collected about you.
  • A list of categories of personal information that we have sold, along with the category of any other company we sold it to. If we have not sold your personal information, we will inform you of that fact.
  • A list of categories of personal information that we have disclosed for a business purpose, along with the category of any other company we shared it with.

Please note, you are entitled to ask us to provide you with this information up to two times in a rolling twelve-month period. When you make this request, the information provided may be limited to the personal information we collected about you in the previous 12 months.

(b) To delete your personal information

If you make this request, we will delete the personal information we hold about you as of the date of your request from our records and direct any service providers to do the same. In some cases, deletion may be accomplished through de-identification of the information. If you choose to delete your personal information, you may not be able to use certain functions that require your personal information to operate.

(c) To stop selling your personal information

We don't sell or rent your personal information to any third parties for any purpose. You are the only owner of your Personal Data and can request disclosure or deletion at any time.

Please note, if you ask us to delete or stop selling your data, it may impact your experience with us, and you may not be able to participate in certain programs or membership services which require the usage of your personal information to function. But in no circumstances, we will discriminate against you for exercising your rights.

AboutUs.title: About us
AboutUs.description: We aim to expand Hearify globally, making it the leading solution for creating AI-powered tests in the education and corporate sectors. Our roadmap includes developing new AI functionality, entering new markets, and forming partnerships with educational platforms and businesses. We are excited to continue innovating and growing together with our users.

data.title: Our mission
data.description: At Hearify, we believe in simplifying and revolutionizing the learning process through automation. Our mission is to empower educators, students, and businesses by providing an advanced AI-powered platform for creating personalized tests and assessments quickly and efficiently. By automating routine test creation tasks, we aim to save time and resources while increasing the effectiveness of knowledge assessment.

data.title: Our story
data.description: Hearify was born out of a deep understanding of the challenges that educators and businesses face in developing personalized learning materials. Our CEO, Sofia Shaposhnikova, with her background and research in artificial intelligence, saw a clear need to automate the creation of tests and assessments. Together with a team of professionals, we have created a solution that uses artificial intelligence to make the learning process more flexible, adaptive, and engaging.

data.title: Why Hearify?
data.description: We understand that time is one of the most valuable resources in today's fast-paced world. Our platform is designed to eliminate the manual work of test development, allowing educators and companies to focus on what really matters - improving learning outcomes. Hearify provides powerful artificial intelligence tools that automatically generate questions from PDFs, videos, and text, ensuring that tests are tailored to the needs of each learner.
